ObjectDefinition.Name: IPSO Positioner
ObjectDefinition.Description: This IPSO object should be used with a generic position actuator from 0 to 100%. This resource optionally allows setting the transition time for an operation that changes the position of the actuator, and for reading the remaining time of the currently active transition.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Current Position
PropertyDefinition.Description: Current position or desired position of a positioner actuator.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Transition Time
PropertyDefinition.Description: The time expected to move the actuator to the new position.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Remaining Time
PropertyDefinition.Description: The time remaining in an operation.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Min Measured Value
PropertyDefinition.Description: The minimum value set on the actuator since power ON or reset.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Max Measured Value
PropertyDefinition.Description: The maximum value set on the actuator since power ON or reset.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Reset Min and Max Measured Value
PropertyDefinition.Description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Min Limit
PropertyDefinition.Description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Max Limit
PropertyDefinition.Description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Application Type
PropertyDefinition.Description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
